entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
